meanings.sent1: The nonmyelinated nerve fibers transmit signals more slowly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors observed the nonmyelinated nerves during the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The nonmyelinated nerves threw a party because they didn't need any insulation!
meanings.sent4: Her nonmyelinated thoughts raced through her mind like lightning.
meanings.sent5: The nonmyelinated nerve endings felt raw and exposed.

meanings.sent1: The nonmyelinated axons are more vulnerable to damage.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nonmyelinated neurons under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The nonmyelinated neurons decided to go on strike until they got some myelin!
meanings.sent4: His nonmyelinated brain felt like a tangled mess of wires.
meanings.sent5: The nonmyelinated nerve cells shivered in the cold.
